mr_mushroom_fidget.title: Mr. Mushroom - ADHD Fidget Friend | 3D Printed Sensory Toy
mr_mushroom_fidget.description:
Meet Mr. Mushroom - the perfect fidget companion for neurodivergent minds! 

üçÑ Designed specifically for ADHD brains
‚ú® Satisfying texture for sensory needs  
üéØ Perfect size for desk or pocket
üíú Created by neurodivergent maker
üå± Eco-friendly 3D printed material

Each Mr. Mushroom is carefully 3D printed with love in Wales. The unique texture provides just the right amount of sensory input for focus and calm.

Perfect for:
- Desk fidgeting during work/study
- Anxiety relief
- ADHD focus tool  
- Sensory seekers
- Gift for neurodivergent friends

Available in multiple colors!

technical_tips: Keep videos under 30 seconds for maximum engagement
